'''Fontemer Aberrants''' are an enemy group found in [[Fontaine]], both on land and underwater. Standard Fontemer Aberrants are usually tolerant of the player unless attacked or another enemy initiates aggression, while adult Fontemer Aberrants and [[Local Legend]]s aggro as normal.

Fontemer Aberrants mostly deal [[Physical]] and [[Hydro]] DMG. Adult Fontemer Aberrants are able to gain elemental [[Shield/Enemy|shields]] while on land, which increases their [[RES]] and allows them to use attacks of elements other than Hydro.

;Standard
*{{Enemy|Angelic Sea Hare}}
*{{Enemy|Armored Crab}}
*{{Enemy|Ball Octopus}}

*{{Enemy|Bubbly Seahorse}}
*{{Enemy|Hat Jellyfish}}
*{{Enemy|Hunter's Ray}}

;Adult
*{{Enemy|Bubbler Seahorse}}
*{{Enemy|Cherubic Sea Hare}}
*{{Enemy|Sternshield Crab}}

;Normal Bosses
*{{Enemy|Emperor of Fire and Iron}}
*{{Enemy|Millennial Pearl Seahorse}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|An aquatic creature found throughout Fontaine.<br>Perhaps due to environmental requirements, it can seemingly only be found in Fontaine.|[[Adventurer Handbook]]}}
